attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, as a public, are sick to death of the constant rise of stabbings & shootings in this country. There is no more respect for others these days. I believe that there is no other way to curb this spate of violence. If people want to use a weapon, then stick them on the front line. When they finish the minimum sentance, then it's straight into learning a trade. No race, gender or religion should be exempt from this. If they choose to be violent then they choose to deal with the strict consequences of their actions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
